description: This dataset contains yearly data on primary education enrollment and GDP per capita in China.

columns.name: Year
columns.description: The calendar year of the record (e.g., 2001, 2002, ...).

columns.name: Primary Enrollment
columns.description: The number of students enrolled in primary education in that year. Some values may be missing.

columns.name: GDP
columns.description: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per capita in USD for the given year. Some values may be missing.
